name: tricycle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small vehicle like a bicycle with two wheels at the back and one at the front, used especially by young children

a vehicle with two wheels at the back and one in front, having a seat for a rider whose feet push pedals around in circles to make the wheels turn: Our three-year-old loves her red tricycle.
